snippet.title: Isonzo Release Date Reveal Trailer I PC, Xbox Series X/S & Xbox One, PlayStation 5&4
snippet.description:
Coming September 13, experience Alpine warfare on the Italian Front with authentic WW1 FPS Isonzo! Available to wishlist now...

From the makers of Verdun and Tannenberg, Isonzo puts you right in the middle of key historical offensives on the visually stunning Italian Front during the Great War. Battlefields vary from high-altitude combat in the Alps and the ferocious battles for the Isonzo river to an assault on the city of Gorizia. Choose your class and loadout, build defenses or staging posts, and prepare to do battle.

Enlist for WW1 Alpine Warfare - sign up for Isonzo now!
* Steam: https://bit.ly/3x1GSIN
* PlayStation 5 & 4: https://bit.ly/3lZRL7r
* Xbox Series X/S & Xbox One: coming soon
* Epic Game Store: https://store.epicgames.com/p/isonzo 

Also, don't forget to like and subscribe to our YouTube channel! 

#Isonzo #WW1GameSeries #FPS
---------------------------------------------
For more information, please visit: http://www.ww1gameseries.com/​ and/or follow us on Social Media:
Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/WW1GameSeries​
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WW1GameSeries​
Reddit: http://www.reddit.com/r/WW1GameSeries​  
Discord server: https://discord.gg/bgrUpf3
